amendment.description: Relating to contracting in the procurement of certain supplies and services.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1468 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1468 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Thomas. (consideration: CR S12778-12791) Relating to contracting in the procurement of certain supplies and services.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1468 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1468 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Thomas.
